data.text: Na xanbi ra, n yi maleka naanin to tixi dunuɲa tongon naaninne ma. Bɔxɔ xɔnna foye naaninne yi suxi e yii, alogo foye yo nama mini bɔxɔ xɔnna xun ma, hanma fɔxɔ igena hanma wudine xun ma.
N yi maleka gbɛtɛ to fɛ, keli sogeteden binni, habadan Alaa taxamasenna yi suxi naxan yii. Bɔxɔ xɔnna nun fɔxɔ igen tɔrɔ sɛnbɛn so maleka naaninna naxanye yii, a yi sɔnxɔ ne ma, a naxa,
“Ɛ nama fe ɲaxin liga bɔxɔ xɔnna ra singen hanma fɔxɔ igena hanma wudine han en yi taxamasenna sa en ma Alaa walikɛne tigi ra.”
Nba, Alaa taxamasenna sa naxanye tigi ra, n yi na xasabin mɛ, muxu wuli kɛmɛ muxu wuli tonge naanin e nun naanin keli Isirayila bɔnsɔnne birin yi:
Taxamasenna yi sa muxu wuli fu nun firin ma Yuda bɔnsɔnni,

Na xanbi ra, n yi yama gbeen to naxan xasabin mi yi yatɛ, sa keli siyane birin nun bɔnsɔnne birin nun yamane birin nun xuine birin yi. E yi tixi manga gbɛdɛn nun Yɛxɛɛ Diin yɛtagi, doma fixɛn nagodoxi e ma, tugu dɛɛne suxi e yii.
E yi e xuini te, e naxa,
Malekane birin yi tixi manga gbɛdɛn nun fonne nun dalise naaninne rabilinni, ne yi bira manga gbɛdɛn yɛtagi, e yɛtagine yi lan bɔxɔn ma, e yi Ala batu,
Na fonna nde yi n maxɔdin, a naxa, “Doma fixɛn nagodoxi ndee ma itoe ra? E kelixi minɛn yi?”
N yi a yabi, n naxa, “N fafe, i tan nan na kolon.” A yi a fala n xa, a naxa, “Muxune nan e ra naxanye bata dangu ɲaxankata waxati gbeeni. E bata e domane xa, e yi e rafixa Yɛxɛɛ Diin wunli.”
Nanara, e tixi Alaa manga gbɛdɛn yɛtagi,
Kamɛn mi fa e suxɛ sɔnɔn,
amasɔtɔ Yɛxɛɛ Diin naxan manga gbɛdɛni,
